text: The Soul Sessions is the debut studio album by English singer-songwriter Joss Stone. It was released on 16 September 2003 by S-Curve Records and EMI/Virgin Records. ==Background== When The Soul Sessions was released on 16 September 2003. At the time Stone was just 16 years old. The album took four days to record. The songs on the album are cover versions of classic soul songs. ==Reviews== The Soul Sessions received positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Joss Stone albums Category:Blues albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Virgin Records albums
title: The Soul Sessions
